  1. He get up very early in order to catch the first bus in the morning.
  2. He didnâ€™t changed his mind until yesterday night
  3. The people who agree on the suggestion please raise your hands.
  4. Whatever how busy you are, you should find time to visit your parents.
  5. Every time he visit the city, he find it turn to a new change.
  6. Everyone knows that learning is vital /very important to oneâ€™s development(growth).
  7. 7.Our new products are so popular that we are all proud of it ////Our new products are very popular, of which we are very proud.
  8. Could you speak a little louder please so that everyone can hear you?
  9. Besides English, youâ€™d better learn another foreign language

  10. In educating children, praise is much (far) more effective than criticism.

  11. They have built as many houses this year as they did last year.

  12. I am sorry to have forgotten to bring the book you want.

  13. The work is too difficult for you to finish.

  14. However difficult it may be, I will never lose my confidence/heart.

  15. The farther an object is away from us, the smaller it looks

  16. It â€˜ s quite right that success consists in diligence

  17. As long as you go on working hard, you â€™Il solve this problem sooner or later.

  18. Given the chance, John might have become an outstanding painter.

  19. She has practiced medicine for three years and four months.

  20. It was in that small room that they worked hard and longed for bright future.

  1. As far as I am concerned, it is difficult for them to cover the truth.
  2. 22.Until the end of the meeting, the manager kept silent.
  3. 23.What I want to say is that to be a volunteer in Olympic games is significant to young people.
  4. 24.In short, everyone should be responsible for his behavior
  5. 25.l am determined to catch up with my classmates in one month.
  6. To my great surprise, he speaks English so well/his English is so good.
  7. It is time to start our conference, let us turn off the radio.
  8. Even though there are a lot difficulties, we are still determined to carry out our plan.
  9. The earth that we are living in is a big ball.
  10. We should learn from Mr Li because he is a man with rich working experience.
  1. Everyone likes to be praised rather than be criticized
  2. People complain that the local government didnâ€™t try its best to deal with the issue of pollution.
  3. As long as you do what you can, no one will accuse you even if you fail it in the future.
  4. He told me to take it easy, because it was no necessary to finish this work in advance.
  5. We put off the conference in order to better cope with the tense situation.
  6. It was in his sophomore year that he transferred to another college.
  7. There is no knowing how long he might be away.
  8. Speak louder so that everyone can hear you.
  9. He is so wicked that I donâ€™t trust him at all.
  10. At that time the family was too poor to send the children to school.
  1. He is used to going to bed late and getting up late.
  2. He turned on TV as soon as he got home.
  3. You should know what you are doing this for.
  4. At present our efforts are focused on developing economy.
  5. 45.No matter where/Wherever we are, we must keep in mind that we are Chinese.
  6. Now that he has apologized, we should forgive him.
  7. He goes to see his grandparents every other week.
  8. To his disappointment, he only got a B in the exam.
  9. Heâ€™d rather stay alone than go to the party.
  10. Itâ€™ s no use grieving over past time.
  1. We are looking forward to watching the World Cup.
  2. She couldn â€˜ t wait to go home to tell the good news to her family.
  3. As far as the climate is concerned, the city is an ideal place to live in.
  4. He can â€˜ t even support himself, let alone a family.
  5. I was shopping when a young man stole my wallet.
  6. However difficult it may be, he firmly believes that he will succeed someday.
  7. There was no mistaking his intentions.
  8. Once you let him start talking, there â€˜ s no stopping him
  9. The more nervous you are in an exam, the more likely you are to make mistakes.
  10. It is doubtful whether his words are true or not
